thread.title: Dangal Star, Sanya Malhotra, Choreographs A Song For Aamir Khan's Movie, Secret Superstar
thread.title_full: Dangal Star, Sanya Malhotra, Choreographs A Song For Aamir Khan's Movie, Secret Superstar

title: Dangal Star, Sanya Malhotra, Choreographs A Song For Aamir Khan's Movie, Secret Superstar
text:
facebook Post Dangal , Sanya Malhotra has officially been fielding for team Aamir (ICYMI, the actress has been interning with him). Now, true to the perks of working with a superstar, Sanya has been entrusted with the responsibility of choreographing for Aamir's next movie, Secret Superstar . The song features the actor himself and, from what we've heard, Sanya hasn't held back from introducing difficult steps. Of course, Mr. Perfectionist managed to nail every single one of them (not that we ever doubted that). 
On her choreography debut, Sanya says, "The fact that I love to dance and love everything associated with it has never been a secret. When Advait asked me to choreograph a sequence for Aamir sir in Secret Superstar, I was ecstatic. Not in my wildest dreams could I have imagined doing something so wonderful.‚Äù Well, this is one debut we're willing to watch on the big screen.
